code: import React from"react";import"./WorkExperience.css";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function WorkExperience(){const experiences=[{role:"Intern/Training",company:"Incadea",duration:"Feb 2023 - July 2023",description:"Joined as intern and was in the learning period for 6 months had great learning experience"},{role:"Software Engineer",company:"Incadea",duration:"Aug 2023 - Present",description:"Developed and Maintained Scalable Application and Enhanced User Experience"}];return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("section",{className:"work-experience",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Work Experience"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"card-container",children:experiences.map((experience,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:experience.role}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h4",{children:experience.company}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{style:{color:"black"},children:experience.duration}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:experience.description})]},index))})]});}export default WorkExperience;
